Title: AN ACT GRANTING TO RICARDO GEMORA A FRANCHISE TO INSTALL, OPERATE AND MAINTAIN AN ELECTRIC LIGHT, HEAT AND POWER PLANT IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF ILOG, OCCIDENTAL NEGROS, PHILIPPINE ISLANDS.
Data:
[ Act No. 3781, November 28, 1930 ]
AN ACT GRANTING TO RICARDO GEMORA A FRANCHISE TO INSTALL, OPERATE AND MAINTAIN AN ELECTRIC LIGHT, HEAT AND POWER PLANT IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF ILOG, OCCIDENTAL NEGROS, PHILIPPINE ISLANDS.
Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the Philippines in Legislature assembled and by the power authority of the same:
Section 1. Subject to the rules and conditions established in Act Numbered Thirty-six hundred and thirty-six, there is hereby granted to Ricardo Gemora, for a period of fifty years from the approval of this Act, the right, privilege, and authority to construct, maintain and operate an electric light, heat and power system for the purpose of generating and distributing electric light, heat and power, for sale within the limits of the municipality of Ilog, Province of Occidental Negros, Philippine Islands.1a—àphi1
Section 2. This Act shall take effect on its approval.
Approved, November 28, 1930.
